title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 05 May 2016 - XWiki
content:
<vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
00:59 <abusenius> has quit  
01:09 <vmassol> has quit  
01:31 <Daemoen> is there an easy way of excluding 'sandbox' and 'main' and 'xwiki' from the pagetree ?  I only want the spaces that we create to be shown

07:20 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki

14:46 <evalica1> is now known as <evalica>  
14:58 <msmeria1> has quit  
15:57 <sagarhani> has joined #xwiki  
16:01 <sagarhani> Hi, This is Sagar. I working on building a extension. I wanted to know how xwiki is different from Media wiki ?  
16:02 <sagarhani> I'm interested in Realtime collaborative editor extension.  
16:07 <mflorea> has quit  
16:08 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
16:09 <evalica> sagarhani: there are many differences :) I tried to see if I find some kind of comparison. There is http://www.xwiki.com/en/comparisons/xwiki-vs-mediawiki but I guess you should test XWiki to see the differences for yourself better.  
16:10 <evalica> sagarhani: wikimatrix again has some details http://www.wikimatrix.org/compare/MediaWiki+XWiki :) you I'm sure you can find this info yourself  
16:11 <evalica> we don't have such comparison on the xwiki.org website - maybe we should, if others think is important.  
16:28 <vmassol> has quit  
16:40 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
16:55 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
16:57 <sagarhani> evalica: Cool. Thanks. I'll have a look at it. :)  
16:58 <evalica> ;)
